snippet: Days after the French government said that it would provide assistance directly to Syrian rebels, Syria accused France of undermining the new United Nations envoy.
abstract: Syrian government says France is undermining the new United Nations envoy, accusing the nation of 'schizophrenia' for its pledge of support for a peaceful resolution to the uprising against President Bashar al-Assad and simultaneously aiding the armed groups driving the insurrection.

byline.contributor: Hala Droubi contributed reporting from Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

lead_paragraph: Days after the French government said that it would provide assistance directly to Syrian rebels, Syria accused France of undermining the new United Nations envoy.

headline.seo: Syria Criticizes France’s Support of Rebels
headline.main: Syria Criticizes France for Supporting Rebels, as Fears Grow of Islamist Infiltration
headline.print_headline: Syria Criticizes France for Supporting Rebels, as Fears Grow of Islamist Infiltration
